title: 1948 Minnesota lieutenant gubernatorial election
text: The 1948 Minnesota lieutenant gubernatorial election took place on November 2, 1948. <a href="Incumbent">Incumbent</a> <a href="Lieutenant%20Governor%20of%20Minnesota">Lieutenant Governor</a> <a href="C.%20Elmer%20Anderson">C. Elmer Anderson</a> of the <a href="Republican%20Party%20of%20Minnesota">Republican Party of Minnesota</a> defeated <a href="Minnesota%20Democratic-Farmer-Labor%20Party">Minnesota Democratic-Farmer-Labor Party</a> challenger <a href="John%20T.%20McDonough%20%28Minnesota%20politician%29">John T. McDonough</a>.
